summary.vsli:raw: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.GenericIdentity" /> class by using the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.GenericIdentity" /> object.

param.name: identity
param.vsli:raw: The object from which to construct the new instance of <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.GenericIdentity" />.

member.name: M:System.Security.Principal.GenericIdentity.#ctor(System.String)

summary.vsli:raw: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.GenericIdentity" /> class representing the user with the specified name.

param.name: name
param.vsli:raw: The name of the user on whose behalf the code is running.

member.name: M:System.Security.Principal.GenericIdentity.#ctor(System.String,System.String)

summary.vsli:raw: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.GenericIdentity" /> class representing the user with the specified name and authentication type.

member.summary: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，該類別表示具有指定名稱和驗證 (Authentication) 類型的使用者。

param.name: name
param.vsli:raw: The name of the user on whose behalf the code is running.

member.param: 程式碼正在代表其執行的使用者名稱。

param.vsli:raw: The type of authentication used to identify the user.

member.param: 用來識別使用者的驗證類型。

exception.vsli:raw:
The <paramref name="name" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
